channel.title: Weapon spec wont work on npc's
channel.description:
Hey guys, Weapon spec isn't working on Npc's I spawn or some other Npc's in the game. seems to work only at minigames and training areas. Well here's the error I get:
[3/7/11 7:14 PM]: simon - actionbutton: 30108 [3/7/11 7:14 PM]: java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 797 [3/7/11 7:14 PM]: at server.model.players.CombatAssistant.activateSpecial( CombatAssistant.java:2739) [3/7/11 7:14 PM]: at server.model.players.CombatAssistant.attackNpc(Combat Assistant.java:198) [3/7/11 7:14 PM]: at server.model.players.Client.process(Client.java:787) [3/7/11 7:14 PM]: at server.model.players.PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHand ler.java:142) [3/7/11 7:14 PM]: at server.Server.main(Server.java:163)

item.title: Weapon spec wont work on npc's
item.dc:creator: @flentman flentman
item.description:
@flentman wrote:

It’s project insanity, and I managed to fix this once by accident while adding chaotic items to the game. problem is that there’s valuable stuff on this server that I need and I’m sure the fix should be easier than what you just said.

Read full topic
item.source: Weapon spec wont work on npc's

item.title: Weapon spec wont work on npc's
item.dc:creator: @Rickrolla Rickrolla
item.description:
@Rickrolla wrote:

I guess it’s delta.
The problem is at your npcspecial setup, what weapon are you using?
You’ve problably copied the code of the Player versus Player special.
You have to customize it to a npcspecial code.

If this hasn’t helped, please reply

Read full topic
item.source: Weapon spec wont work on npc's
